pages.text: $(bred)Yeti Zombie$() is still a mystery, $(bpurple)it is said that someone saw it in a thunderstorm$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)135$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Little Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will become invisible after one minute, and $(l)disappear completely$() after two minutes.$(bblue)It will drop 4 gem when death$().
